exercises.name: Ankle Pumps
exercises.instructions: Move ankles up and down to support circulation.

exercises.name: Deep Breathing
exercises.instructions: Slow deep breaths expanding the chest. Rest between breaths as needed.

exercises.name: Short Walks
exercises.instructions: Walk at an easy pace indoors or on a flat surface.

exercises.name: Sit-to-Stand
exercises.instructions: Stand up from a chair using controlled movement, then sit down slowly.
